profile_positions.description:
• Focusing on portfolio management, to drive impactful and sustainable outcomes in alignment with strategic goals
• Management of complex projects and programs, developing comprehensive project plans and roadmaps, and adeptly tracking milestones, risks, and issues to ensure successful project delivery
• Management of (inter)dependencies between multiple projects, proactively addressing conflicts and bottlenecks to maintain project momentum and achieve desired outcomes
• Demonstration of financial acumen through effective budget management to ensure efficient resource allocation and successful project execution
• Crafting compelling proposals that address client requirements, highlight relevant experience, and articulate the unique value proposition of the organization, resulting in successful RfP responses and new business opportunities
• Management of RfP (Request for Proposal) processes, including issuing RfP, coordinating and evaluating vendor proposals, and facilitating the selection process, while ensuring compliance with requirements and timelines
• Collection of employee feedback and conducting needs assessments for various purposes like informing the development and improvement of training programs or "Best Place to Work" employee survey
• Designing and redesigning trainings and learning & development initiatives within the organization, incorporating best practices and aligning them with strategic objectives, to enhance employee skills and performance
profile_positions.title: Consultant - Organization Transformation

profile_positions.description:
• Focus on strategy and portfolio management within organization transformation initiatives
• Project and program management activities, including creating project plans and roadmaps, tracking milestones, and identifying and managing risks and issues
• (Inter)dependencies management between multiple projects, identifying and addressing potential conflicts or bottlenecks
• Conducting organizational assessments to identify areas for improvement and optimize business processes
• Data collection and analysis to identify trends, patterns, and insights for strategic decision-making
• Budget management (2.5+M EUR) for successful project execution
• Team management, encompassing team building, fostering team alignment, and conducting feedback and retrospective sessions to drive continuous improvement and enhance team performance
• Development of change management plans, including stakeholder analysis, communication strategies, and training materials (e.g., OKRs, Scrum, Digital, etc.)
• Responding to RfPs by preparing comprehensive and compelling proposals that address client requirements, showcase relevant experience, and highlight the value proposition of the organization
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst - Organization Transformation

profile_positions.description:
• Coordination of tax and legal projects (e.g., 30% ruling applications, tax returns, immigration, social security) for clients in the Netherlands, collaborating with foreign Deloitte firms globally
• Overseeing various project progress, including milestones, timelines, and deliverables while proactively identifying and managing risks and issues
• Redefinition of processes and steps to improve project efficiency and streamline workflows
• Communication with clients, acting as the client main contact person
• Management of Deloitte offshore teams for successful project delivery
• Managing monthly billing processes, including accurate tracking of project expenses, generating invoices, and ensuring timely delivery of billing statements to clients
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst - Tax & Legal Projects and Programs management

profile_positions.description:
• Provided support for the BEPS (Base Erosion and Profit Shifting) Project, contributing to research, analysis, and documentation to address international tax challenges
• Assisted in the preparation and coordination of events, ensuring smooth logistics, participant engagement, and successful outcomes
• Conducted comprehensive research for working papers and policy briefs, synthesizing complex information to contribute to evidence-based policy recommendations
• Engaged in case studies focused on tax and development support, examining the impact of tax policies on economic growth and sustainable development
• Contributed to communication efforts, including drafting and editing content, preparing materials, and assisting in the dissemination of information to stakeholders
profile_positions.title: Intern - Global Relations and Development

profile_positions.description:
• Conducted macroeconomic analyses, contributing to the understanding of economic trends, forecasting, and policy implications
• Preparation of policy notes, providing in-depth analyses and recommendations on various economic topics, supporting informed decision-making processes
• Monitoring of major European subjects, staying up to date with key developments, policies, and initiatives, and providing timely updates and analysis to the Economic Department
• Organization of events, ensuring their successful execution, including logistics, participant coordination, and seamless delivery
• Meetings with authorities and companies, fostering diplomatic relations and facilitating communication between the Economic Department of the French Embassy and key stakeholders
profile_positions.title: Intern - Economic Department of the French Embassy in the Czech Republic

company.name: JITRI - Jiangsu Industrial Technology Research Institute

profile_positions.company: JITRI - Jiangsu Industrial Technology Research Institute
profile_positions.description:
• Conducted extensive research on current market trends and competitor analysis, providing valuable insights to support marketing and R&D strategies
• Identified improvement opportunities and made recommendations based on market research findings, contributing to the development of innovative solutions and competitive advantage
• Created engaging and informative content for marketing materials, including brochures, presentations, and online platforms, to effectively communicate the institute's expertise and technological advancements
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather information and data, ensuring accuracy and relevance in marketing content creation
• Supported the marketing and R&D teams in various projects within the Nanjing Institute of Advanced Laser Technologies (NIALT), leveraging research findings to drive decision-making processes and optimize marketing strategies for targeted audiences
profile_positions.title: R&D and Marketing Intern

profile_positions.description:
• Coordinated a dynamic team, fostering collaboration and ensuring smooth project execution .
• Developed and implemented comprehensive project plans, effectively allocating resources, setting milestones, and tracking progress to achieve objectives on time and within budget
• Managed budgetary aspects of advertising campaigns, optimizing financial resources and maintaining cost control while maximizing the impact and reach of promotional efforts
• Conducted proactive canvassing of companies, building and nurturing relationships to secure advertising partnerships and drive revenue growth
• Wrote compelling articles and content to promote products, services, and events, engaging target audiences and enhancing brand visibility
• Spearheaded the recruitment of sales staff, utilizing strategic hiring processes to identify and onboard talented members who contributed to the team's success
profile_positions.title: Advertising Manager and Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
• Coordinated efforts between national and foreign partners to ensure effective collaboration and synergy in the implementation of projects and initiatives
• Successfully organized the 'Race Against Hunger,' a prominent awareness campaign aimed at raising funds and advocating for action against hunger two years in a row
• Provided logistical support, managing resources, and coordinating activities to ensure smooth project operations and timely execution of deliverables
• Led communication efforts, developing and implementing strategies to raise awareness about the organization's mission, activities, and impact
• Facilitated effective communication and collaboration among stakeholders, including team members, partners, and beneficiaries, to achieve project objectives and maximize impact
profile_positions.title: Events and Project Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Volunteer at the Solidays music festival organised to raise funds and raise awareness about AIDS. Versatile tasks: welcoming journalists and photographers, distributing badges, organizing the festival press area, connecting artists and the media.

Volunteer for the "Fête de l'Huma" 2017 season organised by the French newspaper L'Humanité, which offered lectures, debates and concerts. Diverse tasks: press review, drafting of press releases, reception of the journalists and photographers, organisation of interviews, management of social networks.
French teacher for the language café of the University of Sussex: preparation of classes, organisation of weekly meetings, communication on social networks.

Volunteer at Espace Loisirs, a support service for adults with disabilities through cultural and leisure activities to participate in their social integration (Saint-Mandé, France): organisation of events, activities and holidays, accompanying groups, leading and running activities, crisis management, administrative tasks.

Vaincre la mucoviscidose is a NGO supporting patients and their families in every aspect of their life disrupted by cystic fibrosis. The association is organized around 4 priority missions: cure, care, live better, and raise awareness.
Tasks: organisation of the annual fall festival to raise funds and awareness about cystic fibrosis, running of activity stands, food sales, organisation of workshops.
